recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter. A classic breakfast favorite.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
recipes.description: A healthy grilled chicken sandwich with fresh veggies and a hint of mayo. A light and delicious lunch option.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic spaghetti Bolognese with a rich tomato and meat sauce. A hearty meal for lunch or dinner.

recipes.title: Roast Beef Dinner
recipes.description: Juicy roast beef served with mashed potatoes and gravy. A perfect meal for dinner.

recipes.title: Vanilla Cake
recipes.description: A soft, buttery vanilla cake topped with creamy frosting. Perfect as a dessert or snack.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Crispy on the outside, chewy on the inside chocolate chip cookies. Ideal as a dessert or snack.
